title._content: Bandstand in Central Square, Keene New Hampshire

description._content: TITLE Bandstand in Central Square, Keene New Hampshire CREATOR French, J.A., Keene NH SUBJECT Buildings - NH - Keene Business districts - NH - Keene Central business districts Downtown districts Stores and shops - NH - Keene Town squares Bandstands DESCRIPTION Stereograph of the old bandstand in Central Square, Keene New Hampshire. "In 1869, the old town well in Central Square which had supplied the town with water for many years, was filled in and a bandstand built upon the site. In 1900 a second bandstand replaced the earlier structure. Keene's own band performed there, and among the visiting bands which received enthusiastic welcomes was the U.S. Marine Band, which made an appearance in 1907." PUBLISHER Keene Public Library DATE DIGITAL 20080215 DATE ORIGINAL 1880?-1899? RESOURCE TYPE stereographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykcsq080 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known restriction on publication.
